name: MOC-X [LD44]
description:
Multicontinental Oabduction Center - X (X, because X is cool) a.k.a. MOC-X

Made for Ludum Dare 44 - Your life is currency.

Fulfill your dream of being an extraterrestial civilization with only one goal in mind - Abduct as many people as possible!

Control an alien spaceship [WASD] and use your tractor beam (to use it, switch your ship to 'Abduction Mode' first [Tab] and then hold [RMB]) to 'attract' humans.

At the same time watch out for security turrets, if your energy falls to zero, it's game over.

If you can manage to stay alive on Earth for 60 seconds, then you can go back to your space garage and trade caught people for power-ups or just repair your ship.

//Work in progress
